sys_update_version.payload: customcbody { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; background-color: #f7f9fc; } .container { max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; } h1 { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; font-size: 36px; color: #333; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1.5px; } .events-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(350px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; } .event-card { background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); overflow: hidden; display: flex; flex-direction: column; transition: transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s; cursor: pointer; height: 500px; } .event-card:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .event-card img { width: 100%; height: 200px; object-fit: cover; } .event-details { padding: 60px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex-grow: 1; } .event-title { font-size: 22px; margin-bottom: 15px; color: #333; font-weight: bold; } .event-donator, .event-dates div, .event-value, .event-start-bid { font-size: 16px; color: #555; margin-bottom: 10px; word-wrap: break-word; } .event-dates div { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } .event-status { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 15px; } .event-status.item-submitted { color: #3498db; } .event-status.schedule { color: #f39c12; } .event-status.in_progress { color: #27ae60; } .event-status.completed { color: #e74c3c; } .place-bid-btn { background-color: #28a745; color: #fff; border: none; padding: 12px 20px; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 8px; //align-self: flex-end; align-items: center; margin-top: auto; } .add-to-options { display: flex; justify-content: center; } .place-bid-btn:hover { background-color: #218838; } /* Item details section styles */ .event-details-section { margin-top: 40px; padding: 20px; background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .event-details-section h2 { font-size: 28px; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #333; font-weight: bold; } .event-details-section img { width: 100%; height: 300px; object-fit: cover; margin-bottom: 20px; } .details { font-size: 16px; color: #555; } .details p { margin-bottom: 10px; } .details .place-bid-btn { margin-top: 20px; } /* Modal styles */ .modal-content { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); padding: 20px; background-color: #fefefe; } .modal-header { border-bottom: none; text-align: center; position: relative; /* For positioning the close button */ } .modal-header h4 { font-size: 1.5em; font-weight: bold; color: #FF8C42; } .modal-header .close { position: absolute; right: 20px; top: 20px; font-size: 1.5em; color: #aaa; opacity: 1; transition: color 0.3s; /* Smooth transition for hover effect */ } .modal-header .close:hover { color: #333; /* Darker color on hover */ } .modal-body { text-align: left; } .modal-body p { margin: 10px 0; font-size: 1em; color: #555; } .modal-body strong { display: inline-block; width: 120px; /* Fixed width for alignment */ color: #333; } /* Button styles inside modal */ .add-to-options .btn-secondary { margin-right: 1rem; /*background: linear-gradient(45deg, #C8DF52, #C8DF52);*/ color: #fff; background-color: #428bca; border-color: #357ebd; padding: 1rem 2rem; /* border-radius: 2.5rem; */ box-shadow: 0 .4rem .6rem rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); font-size: 21px; cursor: pointer; align-items: center; /* align-items: center; */ transition: background .3s, box-shadow .3s; } .imgFix { width: 84%; } .imgC { display: flex; justify-content: center; } .add-to-options .btn-secondary:hover { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #394372, #4E598C); /* Lighten the gradient on hover */ box-shadow: 0 6px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); /* Slightly deeper shadow on hover */ } .add-to-options .btn-secondary .icon-image { width: 16px; /* Adjust size as needed */ height: 16px; /* Adjust size as needed */ margin-right: 5px; } .event-card { border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 10px; margin: 10px; border-radius: 5px; } .event-title { font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; } .event-description { margin: 10px 0; } .btn { display: inline-block; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 5px; } .countdown { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; } sp_instancecolortruecb_cloned_my_donationfalsecb cloned my donation[{"name":"show_star_rating","default_value":"Use system properties","section":"Presentation","label":"Show star rating","type":"choice","choices":[{"label":"Yes","value":"Yes"},{"label":"No","value":"No"},{"label":"Use system properties","value":"Use system properties"}]},{"hint":"Number of articles to display per page","name":"limit_article","section":"other","default_value":"10","label":"Number of articles to display per page","type":"integer"}]truefalsesp_widgetchristy2024-06-26 16:23:538f2f1ad5930f021094e3f15a7bba10f97cb cloned my donationbcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090sp_widget_8f2f1ad5930f021094e3f15a7bba10f9christy2024-06-26 16:50:52
